channel.title: Comments on: About Nothing and Everything

item.title: By: shin
item.dc:creator: shin
item.description: Omg. I know where Foton plays. I'm such a stalker :P
item.content:encoded: Omg. I know where Foton plays. I’m such a stalker ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description: I was thinking the exact same thing, Foton....
item.content:encoded: I was thinking the exact same thing, Foton….

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I would guess certain classes are prone to dramatics because they can. Would your guild hesitate for even a second in booting Rogue49 for demanding an UBRS item? Mine wouldn't.
I've sometimes wondered if people that are hard to get along with purposely roll critical classes because they would be unguildable otherwise. Which came first, the priest/cleric or the diva? The world may never know.
item.content:encoded:
I would guess certain classes are prone to dramatics because they can. Would your guild hesitate for even a second in booting Rogue49 for demanding an UBRS item? Mine wouldn’t.

I’ve sometimes wondered if people that are hard to get along with purposely roll critical classes because they would be unguildable otherwise. Which came first, the priest/cleric or the diva? The world may never know.

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description:
Hmmm....we had a spot of guild drama last night, and it was a priest (and warrior friend) who were at the heart of it. Seems she got pissed that another healer had the *audacity* to roll against her (and win) on some item that dropped in UBRS.
The warrior /gguit .... and the guild leader (on an alt) asked the priest (not the one who got the item, mind) if she wanted to quit or if he should log onto his main and boot her....
item.content:encoded:
Hmmm….we had a spot of guild drama last night, and it was a priest (and warrior friend) who were at the heart of it. Seems she got pissed that another healer had the *audacity* to roll against her (and win) on some item that dropped in UBRS.

The warrior /gguit …. and the guild leader (on an alt) asked the priest (not the one who got the item, mind) if she wanted to quit or if he should log onto his main and boot her….

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Good news for the /lfg folks - the latest patch is supposed to not make that channel "on by default" anymore.
Also good to see you back and posting Foton. What is up with healers often (not always, but often) turning out to be the biggest drama queening, attention-whoring, troublemakers to the Nth degree? Tanks and DPS types don't nearly seem to cause that much trouble ...
item.content:encoded:
Good news for the /lfg folks – the latest patch is supposed to not make that channel “on by default” anymore.

Also good to see you back and posting Foton. What is up with healers often (not always, but often) turning out to be the biggest drama queening, attention-whoring, troublemakers to the Nth degree? Tanks and DPS types don’t nearly seem to cause that much trouble …

item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description: I gotta agree with Marlowe there. Now you can get Barrens chat all over the server! Fantastic!
item.content:encoded: I gotta agree with Marlowe there. Now you can get Barrens chat all over the server! Fantastic!

item.title: By: Marlowe
item.dc:creator: Marlowe
item.description: The person you need to hunt down like the dog he is, is the dev who thought the global retardation broadcast network LFG channel was a good idea and would "fix" grouping.
item.content:encoded: The person you need to hunt down like the dog he is, is the dev who thought the global retardation broadcast network LFG channel was a good idea and would “fix” grouping.

item.title: By: Dom
item.dc:creator: Dom
item.description: So wait, it was a female married player who cheated on her husband? So much for gender stereotyping!
item.content:encoded: So wait, it was a female married player who cheated on her husband? So much for gender stereotyping!
